name: Smart India Hackathon 2025
description: Mega annual hackathon focused on innovative tech solutions for real-life problems. Teams compete nationally.

name: CodeFunDo++
description: Microsoft hackathon for social impact, open to Indian engineering colleges. Themes include health, safety, and education.

name: HackInOut 9.0
description: India’s premier 36-hour hackathon with tracks in AI, ML, blockchain and sustainability. Hosted annually.

name: Synapse Hacks 2025
description: Flagship BITS Pilani hackathon supporting IoT, robotics, and fintech ideas. Collaboration with national sponsors.

name: IIT Kanpur E-Summit Hackathon
description: Annual entrepreneurship themed hackathon for India’s top student innovators.

name: Technozion Hackathon
description: Premier hackathon from NIT Warangal, with themes including AI for good and green technologies.

name: InOut Campus Hack
description: National-level intense coding contest focused on product development and rapid prototyping.

name: Techfest Hackathon
description: Asia’s largest student hackathon, a part of IIT Bombay’s Techfest with pan-India participation.

name: Code Hackathon
description: VIT Vellore flagship coding marathon for innovative solutions in tech and software.

name: GitHub India Hackathon
description: GitHub India virtual-offline blended hackathon for open-source and community-driven projects.

name: BYJU’S Hackathon
description: BYJU’S EdTech focused student hackathon for tools, platforms and analytics.

name: Flipkart GRID 2025
description: Flipkart’s annual tech innovation contest, case study & solution hackathon.

name: Google Student Hackathon India
description: Google’s student hackathon for product and cloud ideas. Grand finale at IIT Guwahati.

name: SIH Internal College Round
description: Internal selection round for Smart India Hackathon, Jadavpur University.

name: Techathon
description: DTU’s annual open hackathon for multi-theme challenges including AI, IoT, and software engineering.
